entry.title: Russia's Lavrov Says NATO Is Using Ukraine as a Proxy, Warns Against Global Conflict
entry.content: Russiaâ€™s top diplomat said the West was engaged in a proxy war with his country that could escalate into a global conflict with nuclear weapons, as Western nations elevated their commitment to helping Ukraine defend itself.

entry.title: In Ukrainian Villages, Fears Grow for Men Taken to Russia
entry.content: Russian forces stayed only ten days in the tiny village of Velykyi Bobryk, but when they left they took six local men with them. Now their families are trying to find out what happened to their loved ones.
